name: Silly Skateboarding - Ludum Dare 49
description:
The html5 version of this game can have some problems, so i recommend you to download the game if possible!

A game about doing skateboarding with an unstable skateboard! Collect as much score as you can before your skateboard goes completely nuts! 

--If you like my work, please follow me on social media!--

Twitter: Ricardo Reyes Paz (@richard08Games) / Twitter
